text.section: This section does not affect the right of a respondent to bring a civil action against a person that has filed a complaint under Subtitle 10, Part I of this title.

A person is guilty of a misdemeanor if:
the person has claimed to be aggrieved under Subtitle 10, Part I of this title;
the person has pursued the complaint under §§ 20-1006 and 20-1008 through 20-1011 of this title;
the Commission has:
found the complaint to be unfounded; or
dismissed the complaint without further action against the respondent; and
the court has found the complaint to have been made maliciously.
A person convicted under this section is subject to imprisonment not exceeding 1 year or a fine not exceeding $500 or both.
